items.title: Seniors relive their days of wanderlust and thrill-seeking with virtual reality. ‘It’s about all the memories that it brings back’
items.description: “We got to go underwater and didn't even have to hold our breath!” exclaimed 81-year-old Ginny Baird following the virtual submersion.

items.title: U.S. launches strikes against Islamic State group in Nigeria after attacks target Christians
items.description: A Defense Department official said the U.S. worked with Nigeria to carry out the strikes and that they'd been approved by Abuja.
